Gaz Beadle was left mortified when he accidentally flashed more than he'd intended to on Instagram tonight.

The Geordie Shore star, 31, uploaded an adorable picture of himself enjoying bathtime with his 22-month-old son Chester.

As they splashed around in the water, Gaz was having so much fun he failed to notice that his penis was fully visible underneath the bubbles.

He quickly deleted the photo, uploaded a clean version and then took to his Instagram stories to apologise if he'd offended anyone.

But that was before fans had spotted the mishaps, with dozens flooding the comments in fits of laughter to point it out.

(Image: Instagram)

"Lovely pic but you need some more bubbles," one commented.

Another posted: "You need a few more bubbles in that bath."

"Geez, put it away!" a third said.

Another joked, referencing the nickname he once gave to his privates, that: "At least we know parsnips float."

(Image: Instagram)

When he got out of the bath and ready for bed he sat Chester on his lap as he said sorry to his followers.

Gaz told them: "I just want to apologise, Emma sent me a picture of me and Chester in the bath.

"I put it straight on Instagram... Not noticing that my d**k was floating in the water.

"So I apologise, the picture is deleted and yeah... Sorry."

(Image: instagram)

Gaz's girlfriend Emma McVey is currently expecting their second baby, a little girl.

Emma was forced to hit back at "bump shamers" when she was pregnant with Chester.

During that pregnancy, the model was cruelly trolled about her tiny baby bump, leading her to withdraw from regularly posting on social media.
description: The Geordie Shore star, 31, swiftly deleted the saucy picture and later apologised to his Instagram followers
